quest.name: Fresh Eats and Ripe Sweets
journal:
Maru is plotting something tasty.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Deliver steaming victuals and amra to workers in the jungle.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You got time to spare? 'Cause I've got grub to share. Specifically with the folks protectin' the ruins an' temples in the Shroud of the Samgha...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Here, take these sweets an' eats an' follow the sound of rumblin' bellies. Tell them the Hippo Riders sent you...

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOSTA04561
dialogue.text: What ho! Is something the matter?

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOSTA04561
dialogue.text: For me? Why, my greatest thanks to you, good womanman!

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOSTA04561
dialogue.text: Of all the things to encounter in these jungles, a warm meal is a welcome surprise indeed.

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOSTA04561
dialogue.text: We have resumed our regular patrols, so you may rest easy under the watchful eye of the Radiant Host. Be sure to pass along my regards to your Riders!

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOSTB04561
dialogue.text: If it isn't Forename! What brings you out this far?

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOSTB04561
dialogue.text: Warm vittles with ripe amra for dessert! Why, my empty stomach was just serenading me with discontent but moments ago─might you have heard it?

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOSTB04561
dialogue.text: If this aroma is to be believed, I daresay I shall soon become a true fanatic of the Hippo Riders' meal service. My thanks to you!

dialogue.name: ROOKIESTEWARD04561
dialogue.text: Oh, hello! Have you business with me?

dialogue.name: ROOKIESTEWARD04561
dialogue.text: Who would I be to deny such delectable generosity? I humbly accept!

dialogue.name: ROOKIESTEWARD04561
dialogue.text: We are by no means yet free of the shadow of misfortune, but it is precisely for this reason that I became a steward. After I have partaken in your kindness, madamsir, I shall finish the rest of my rounds with vigor!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Those temples an' ruins are important parts of our culture, so sendin' out the occasional warm meal to our guardians is the least we can do. Here's a little somethin' for you, too...
